text.div:
Salmonellosis (Tests for Salmonella except S. typhi and S. paratyphi by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    17563-8 Salmonella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    20951-0 Salmonella sp serotype [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    20953-6 Salmonella sp identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    20955-1 Salmonella sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    23602-6 Salmonella enteritidis [Presence] in Stool by Organism specific culture
    34891-2 Salmonella enteritidis [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    42255-0 Salmonella and Shigella sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    43371-4 Salmonella and Shigella sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    48806-4 Salmonella sp+Shigella sp+Escherichia coli enterotoxic identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    56475-7 Salmonella sp antigenic formula [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    59846-6 Salmonella sp identified [Type] in Isolate
    65756-9 Salmonella sp serovar [Type] in Isolate
    73672-8 Salmonella sp phage type in Isolate
    82301-3 Salmonella sp [Presence] in Stool by Culture
